label: Title
desc: Title of the page. Leave it empty to use the default page title

label: Type
desc: Type of the content i.e. book, game

label: Image
desc: Image for the content. At least 50x50 pixels and with maximal ratio 3:1.

label: Other
desc: Here you can put other Open Graph metatags using following format: PROPERTY=CONTENT i.e. og:country-name=USA
